name: Platformerer (Graugen)
description:
Recommended you play fullscreen as I've noticed some issues with resolution.

You play as 2 platforms that can move and jump. By switching between them (left shift) you 'lock' the one you aren't playing as in place.

Only started learning unity about 3 weeks ago and this is what I made for the Game Jam, hope you enjoy!

Controls:

Left/Right = A/D or Arrow Keys

Spacebar = Jump

Left Shift = Switch and lock

If you have any feedback I'd love to hear it!
